top.title: Trump removes video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
top.summary: The US president said he "didn't make a mistake", adding he had only seen the beginning of the video before it was posted.

top.title: Trump signs executive order threatening tariffs for countries trading with Iran
top.summary: The order did not specify the rate that could be imposed, but used 25% as an example.

top.title: Milan-Cortina Games begin with vibrant opening ceremony
top.summary: Andrea Bocelli and Mariah Carey perform as part of vibrant opening ceremony for the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics.

top.title: Baldur's Gate to be turned into TV series - without the game's developers
top.summary: The show will be made by Craig Mazin, who co-created the acclaimed game adaptation The Last Of Us.

top.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5m over claim driver raped passenger
top.summary: The verdict is expected to influence the outcome of thousands of other cases against the ride hailing firm.

top.title: Google staff call for firm to cut ties with ICE
top.summary: More than 900 Google employees signed a letter opposing company links to federal immigration actions.

title.#text: We found 20 Verge-approved gifts on sale ahead of Valentine’s Day
Apple might let you use ChatGPT from CarPlay
